# accessory

**Instance Property**

The accessory involved in the event, if any.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var accessory: ASAccessory? { get }
```

## Discussion

The session populates this member for event types like [doc://com.apple.AccessorySetupKit/documentation/AccessorySetupKit/ASAccessoryEventType/accessoryAdded] and [doc://com.apple.AccessorySetupKit/documentation/AccessorySetupKit/ASAccessoryEventType/accessoryChanged], but not for life cycle or picker events like [doc://com.apple.AccessorySetupKit/documentation/AccessorySetupKit/ASAccessoryEventType/activated] or [doc://com.apple.AccessorySetupKit/documentation/AccessorySetupKit/ASAccessoryEventType/pickerDidPresent].

## Inspecting the event

- **ASAccessory**: An accessory discovered by the accessory session.
- **eventType**: The type of event, such as accessory addition or removal, or picker presentation or removal.
- **ASAccessoryEventType**: An enumeration of the types of events encountered during accessory discovery
